annotation.spannedText: The number is low because an effective tetanus vaccine is given as part of the NHS childhood vaccination programme

classMention.mentionClass: The number is low because an effective tetanus vaccine is given as part of the NHS childhood vaccination programme

annotation.spannedText: Most people who get tetanus weren't vaccinated against it or didn't complete the entire vaccination schedule

classMention.mentionClass: Most people who get tetanus weren't vaccinated against it or didn't complete the entire vaccination schedule

annotation.spannedText: Contact your GP or visit your nearest minor injuries unit if you're concerned about a wound

classMention.mentionClass: Contact your GP or visit your nearest minor injuries unit if you're concerned about a wound

annotation.spannedText: Go immediately to your nearest accident and emergency (A&E) department or call 999 for an ambulance if you develop severe muscle stiffness or spasms

classMention.mentionClass: Go immediately to your nearest accident and emergency (A&E) department or call 999 for an ambulance if you develop severe muscle stiffness or spasms

annotation.spannedText: This course of five injections should provide long-lasting protection against tetanus

classMention.mentionClass: This course of five injections should provide long-lasting protection against tetanus

annotation.spannedText: if you or your child has a deep or dirty wound, it's best to get medical advice

classMention.mentionClass: if you or your child has a deep or dirty wound, it's best to get medical advice

annotation.spannedText: If you're not sure whether you've had the full vaccination course, contact your GP surgery for advice

classMention.mentionClass: If you're not sure whether you've had the full vaccination course, contact your GP surgery for advice

annotation.spannedText: you should ideally make sure you're fully vaccinated before travelling abroad

classMention.mentionClass: you should ideally make sure you're fully vaccinated before travelling abroad

annotation.spannedText: Contact your GP surgery for advice if you're planning on travelling abroad and haven't been fully vaccinated against tetanus, or you're going to an area with limited medical facilities and your last vaccine dose was more than 10 years ago

classMention.mentionClass: Contact your GP surgery for advice if you're planning on travelling abroad and haven't been fully vaccinated against tetanus, or you're going to an area with limited medical facilities and your last vaccine dose was more than 10 years ago
